# Cited. â€” AI Visibility Agency

> Cited is the first agency 100% dedicated to Generative Engine Optimization (GEO). We help brands become visible in AI-generated answers from ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini, and Google AI.

## Services

- AI Readiness Audit: visibility analysis across 5 AI providers with proprietary scoring
- Technical Optimization: Schema.org implementation, structured data, E-E-A-T signals
- AI-Optimized Content: citation-ready articles, FAQs, and structured Q&A
- Competitor Intelligence: track and benchmark competitor AI visibility
- Question Discovery: identify high-value prompts users ask AI about your industry

## What Makes Cited Different

- First agency 100% focused on GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)
- Proprietary AI Readiness scoring across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini, and Grok
- End-to-end service: audit, strategy, content creation, and technical implementation
- 90-day measurable visibility commitment tracked monthly
- Industry-specific approaches for SaaS, Real Estate, Healthcare, Fintech, E-commerce, and Consulting
